item.title: [Python] Increment of count variable and speed comparison of enumerate
item.description: In Python, you may need a counter when turning a for statement in a sequence. :smiley: At that time, it seems that the easy way is to define the counter outside the for statement and increment it within the for statement, or to acquire the counter using enumerate :relaxed: When I heard the story, I wondered which one could process faster :confused: So I decided to measure the speed :grin: The measurement code is here.
